nodes.explanation: proper nouns indicating a person's name and whether they are positioned on the left or right side of an image
people's positions in a visual scene based on the 'left' and 'right' cues
instances of the word "left" or "right" followed by a number that is higher than 5, indicating a spatial location
locations or positions of individuals in an image
positions or directions related to someone's location in an image or scene
people who are positioned on the left side of an image or scene
proper nouns related to news events or people (e.g., names of individuals and organizations)
specific mentions of people leaving a place or position
